universum.studios.android.device.screen

Class ScreenUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • universum.studios.android.device.screen.ScreenUtils

  • public final class ScreenUtils
extends Object
    Simple utility class specifying API allowing to manage screen of the current Android device.
    Author:
    Martin Albedinsky

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static boolean hideSoftKeyboard(Activity activity)
      Hides soft keyboard from the current window.

    • Method Detail

      • hideSoftKeyboard

        public static boolean hideSoftKeyboard(@NonNull
                                       Activity activity)
        Hides soft keyboard from the current window.

        Note, that this will not work when you want to hide soft keyboard while a dialog is visible, use hideSoftKeyboard(View) instead.

        Parameters:
        activity - Current activity context to obtain the current focused view.
        Returns:
        True if hiding was successful, false if a window of the given activity does not have focused view at this time.

      • hideSoftKeyboard

        public static boolean hideSoftKeyboard(@NonNull
                                       View focusedView)
        Hides soft keyboard from the current window using token of the given focused view.
        Parameters:
        focusedView - The view which has focus at this time.
        Returns:
        True if hiding was successful, false if the view does not have focus at this time.

      • showSoftKeyboard

        public static boolean showSoftKeyboard(@NonNull
                                       Activity activity)
        Shows soft keyboard on the current window.

        Note, that this will not work when you want to show soft keyboard while a dialog is visible, use showSoftKeyboard(View) instead.

        Parameters:
        activity - Current activity context to obtain the current focused view.
        Returns:
        True if showing was successful, false otherwise.

      • showSoftKeyboard

        public static boolean showSoftKeyboard(@NonNull
                                       View focusedView)
        Shows soft keyboard on the current window using token of the given focused view.
        Parameters:
        focusedView - The view which has focus at this time. If the view does not have focus, focus for that view will be requested by View.requestFocus().
        Returns:
        True if showing was successful, false otherwise.
